title: Tire producers - based on global revenue 2018
summary: The graph shows the Revenue billion of based global revenue Company .
You can see that Sumitomo_Rubber_Industries_(Japan) has the lowest Revenue billion , averaging at £ 7 , Continental_(Germany) is a little bit higher coming in at £ 58 .
Michelin_(France) is a little higher again , coming in at £ 26 ; Then a bit more of a jump to £ 28 for Bridgestone_(Japan) and the Tire expensive , £ 28 Revenue for Goodyear_(U.S.) global .
gold: This statistic shows the world 's largest tire manufacturers in 2018 , based on tire-related revenue . Continental 's revenue from its tire division amounted to around 13 billion U.S. dollars in 2018 . The world 's largest tire makers The ranking of the world 's largest tire manufacturers is dominated by European and Asian manufacturers .
